# Unity specific folders
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/
MemoryCaptures/

# User-specific settings
UserSettings/

# Auto-generated Unity/VS files
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd

# Visual Studio specific
.vscode/
*.VC.db
*.VC.VC.opendb
*.dbmdl
*.bak
*.backup
*.log

# Visual Studio Code
.vscode/

# Crash and profiler data
sysinfo.txt

# OS-specific
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Unity packages/builds
*.unitypackage
*.apk
*.aab
*.exe
*.app
*.xcodeproj

# Rider (in case you ever switch)
.idea/
*.sln.dotSettings
